text:
…Well, it was good. I think there was a
notable improvement in your sharpness.

Haha, thank you. If it's your assessment,
then there's no mistake.

By the end of this training camp, it seems
I'll be able to unveil a more grown-up me to all the fans.

…Speaking of which,
during this training camp—

Sakuya?
Is there something on your mind?

No… It's just that during the camp, I suddenly
thought about how I won't be able to see the fans.

I wondered if I might feel lonely…
But it might just be my imagination.

I see… Indeed, during the training camp,
the opportunities for exposure are reduced.

Yeah… I understand that this training camp is also
for the sake of pleasing the fans, but…

...If only I could convey to the fans
how much they mean to Sakuya…

In that case… How about increasing Sakuya's
presence on Twesta during the camp?

Even though the camp is already demanding,
increasing Sakuya's workload might be a bit much…

Yeah, it's a good idea.
Thank you, Producer-san.

It doesn't have to be direct.
Sometimes, short messages can have a deeper impact.

Right.
Short words can sometimes leave a lasting impression.

I hope everyone can convey their support
for Sakuya during the training camp.

Yes. Let's start by updating Twesta
with Sakuya's current situation right away…!
